dict.acceptation: 层，层次；膜；[植]压条；放置者，计划者；
把…分层堆放；借助压条法；生根繁殖；将（头发）剪成不同层次；
形成或分成层次；[植]通过压条法而生根；

sent.orig: Skin structure is divided into five levels, namely: cuticle, transparent layer, layer tablets, essential layer, layer.
sent.trans: 皮肤结构共分五层，分别为：角质层、透明层、粒层、本质层、基底层。

sent.orig: The basic structure is divided into basal layer, alcohol-soluble pigmented resin layer-Layer and adhesive layer.
sent.trans: 基本结构分基膜层、醇溶性染色树脂层、镀铝层和胶黏层。

sent.orig: Two-layer design features a waterproof outer layer and a fleece inner layer. Can be worn separately.
sent.trans: 内外两层设计，外层米色外套为防水风褛，绿色内层为保暖抓毛外套，可独立穿著。

sent.orig: The framework of study consists of three layers: data layer, model layer and application layer.
sent.trans: 数字流域的整体框架可分为三层：数据层、模型层和应用层。

sent.orig: And soil fertilities of every kind of land were surface layer medium layer>deeper layer.
sent.trans: 各地类土壤的肥力水平均表现为表层最高，中层次之，下层最低。
